alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Panola; Sabine; San Augustine; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 11:40PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of De Soto, northwestern Red River, southern Caddo, southern Bossier and Sabine Parishes, southeastern Harrison, eastern Panola, Shelby, eastern San Augustine and Sabine Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1140 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Marshall to 9 miles northeast of Tenaha to near Joaquin to San Augustine. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Bossier City, Center, Mansfield, Milam, Haughton, Greenwood, Blanchard, Many, Waskom, San Augustine, Stonewall, Zwolle, Logansport, Hemphill, Pineland, Joaquin, Converse, Deberry and Elysian Fields. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northwestern Louisiana...and eastern and northeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Harrison; Panola; Sabine; San Augustine; Shelby
